author: Sentinel Digital Desk
title: Assam: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat elated over peace pact with ULFA - Sentinelassam
text: Assam: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat elated over peace pact with ULFA RSS chief Dr Mohan Bhagwat on Saturday met Swayamseavks and eminent persons, including Union minister Sarbananda Sonowal, at Keshab Bhawan in Dibrugarh. A CORRESPONDENT DIBRUGARH: RSS chief Dr Mohan Bhagwat on Saturday met Swayamseavks and eminent persons, including Union minister Sarbananda Sonowal, at Keshab Bhawan in Dibrugarh. Bhagwat arrived in Dibrugarh on Friday from Majuli and stayed at Keshab Bhawan. The meeting between Dr Bhagawat and Sonowal took place at the Keshab Bhawan from 9 am to around 9.46 am on Saturday morning. "A meeting was held at Keshab Bhawan in Dibrugarh where Union minister Sarbananda Sonowal and eminent persons of Dibrugarh were present. Mohan Bhagwat expressed his happines over the peace pact with [ULFA](https://www.sentinelassam.com/topheadlines/assam-peace-accord-signed-with-united-liberation-front-of-asom-ulfa-683784)," said a senior RSS member. He further said the RSS chief mentioned that is a very positive step, which will encourage the growth of the state of Assam. Also Read; [ Assam: Peace accord signed with United Liberation Front of Asom (ULFA)](https://www.sentinelassam.com/topheadlines/assam-peace-accord-signed-with-united-liberation-front-of-asom-ulfa-683784) Also Watch:
